desc: Bitcoin's network effects â€” why the most adopted network wins and keeps winning.

msgs.text: A new network/technology needs to be 10x better to replace the old. This ain't happening in crypto. Bitcoin is the best. There is no second best and never will be a second best or a flippening! More on the 10x idea in the context of building a company: https://medium.com/@joeantenucci/peter-thiels-4-essential-rules-for-creating-a-dominant-company-7f2f3024a43
Network effects create a strong winner-take-all environment, which leads to a single dominant platform instead of many smaller ones.
